metadata.title: CVE-2016-4036 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The quagga package before 0.99.23-2.6.1 in openSUSE and SUSE LinuxEnterprise Server 11 SP 1 uses weak permissions for /etc/quagga, whichallows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading files in thedirectory.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4036` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

quagga - 0.99.24.1-2ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: quagga package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99.24.1-2ubuntu1.1').
